title: Zomppa's Kimchi
instructions:
1. Peel skin off of cucumbers.
  2. Slice the cucumbers in of inch slices.
  3. Place cumbers in a bowl with salt. Let sit for 15 minutes.
  4. With hands, squeeze liquid out of the cucumbers.
  5. Place cucumbers back in bowl. Add the garlic, ginger, red pepper powder, fish sauce, lemon juice, sesame oil and honey.
  6. With hands, mush all ingredients together. Taste.
  7. Add more hot pepper, fish sauce or honey to adjust the taste to your liking. 8. Place in airtight container and let refrigerate for 3 hours before enjoying.

extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 tablespoon of fish sauce (can find at grocery store in Asian section)
extendedIngredients.name: fish sauce

extendedIngredients.originalString: cup of red pepper powder (can find at Korean market), plus more to taste
extendedIngredients.name: red pepper powder

extendedIngredients.originalString: 3 organic scallions, sliced, include green and white parts
extendedIngredients.name: scallions
